content.text: Match ends, FC Schalke 04 2, Montpellier 2.
Second Half ends, FC Schalke 04 2, Montpellier 2.
Foul by Kyriakos Papadopoulos (FC Schalke 04).
Hilton (Montpellier) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Hilton.
Goal!  FC Schalke 04 2, Montpellier 2. Souleymane Camara (Montpellier) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jonathan Tinhan.

Attempt missed. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar (FC Schalke 04) left footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Jefferson Farfán with a through ball following a fast break.
Foul by Jamel Saihi (Montpellier).
Marco Höger (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Geoffrey Jourdren.
Attempt saved. Ibrahim Afellay (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Christian Fuchs.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Tranquillo Barnetta replaces Lewis Holtby.
Foul by Jefferson Farfán (FC Schalke 04).
Benjamin Stambouli (Montpellier) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt blocked. Souleymane Camara (Montpellier) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Kyriakos Papadopoulos (FC Schalke 04) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Christian Fuchs with a cross following a set piece situation.
Daniel Congré (Montpellier) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Ibrahim Afellay (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Daniel Congré (Montpellier).
Rémy Cabella (Montpellier) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Rémy Cabella (Montpellier).

Substitution, Montpellier. Joris Marveaux replaces Marco Estrada.
Substitution, Montpellier. Jonathan Tinhan replaces Younès Belhanda.
Atsuto Uchida (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Souleymane Camara (Montpellier).
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Jefferson Farfán replaces Teemu Pukki.
Offside, Montpellier. Marco Estrada tries a through ball, but Souleymane Camara is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Lewis Holtby.
Rémy Cabella (Montpellier) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ibrahim Afellay (FC Schalke 04).
Attempt missed. Kyriakos Papadopoulos (FC Schalke 04) header from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Christian Fuchs with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Mapou Yanga-Mbiwa.
Souleymane Camara (Montpellier) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Marco Höger (FC Schalke 04) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lewis Holtby (FC Schalke 04).
Marco Estrada (Montpellier) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Substitution, FC Schalke 04. Ibrahim Afellay replaces Julian Draxler because of an injury.
Substitution, Montpellier. Daniel Congré replaces Karim Aït Fana.
Goal!  FC Schalke 04 2, Montpellier 1. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar (FC Schalke 04) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Garry Bocaly (Montpellier) is shown the red card.
Penalty conceded by Garry Bocaly (Montpellier) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty FC Schalke 04. Julian Draxler draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt saved. Benedikt Höwedes (FC Schalke 04) right footed shot from very close range is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Kyriakos Papadopoulos.

Corner,  FC Schalke 04. Conceded by Geoffrey Jourdren.
